actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE perf_posts SET
		post_title = '{{title.text}}',
		post_excerpt = '{{excerpt.text}}',
		post_author = '{{author.selectedOptionValue}}',
		post_status = '{{p_status.selectedOptionValue}}'
   
  WHERE id = {{Table1.selectedRow.id}};

UPDATE perf_posts SET
		post_title = '{{title.text}}',
		post_excerpt = '{{excerpt.text}}',
		post_author = '{{author.selectedOptionValue}}',
		post_status = '{{p_status.selectedOptionValue}}'
   
  WHERE ID = {{Table1.selectedRow.ID}};

DELETE FROM perf_posts
  WHERE id = {{Table1.triggeredRow.id}};

DELETE FROM perf_posts
  WHERE ID = {{Table1.triggeredRow.ID}};
SELECT term_id,name FROM perf_terms  ORDER BY term_id;
SELECT term_id,name FROM perf_terms;

UPDATE perf_users SET
		user_login = '{{update_col_2.text}}',
    user_pass = '{{update_col_3.text}}',
    user_nicename = '{{update_col_4.text}}',
    user_email = '{{update_col_5.text}}'
  WHERE ID = {{Table1.selectedRow.ID}};

UPDATE perf_users SET
		user_login = '{{update_col_2.text}}',
    user_pass = '{{update_col_3.text}}',
    user_nicename = '{{update_col_4.text}}',
    user_email = '{{update_col_5.text}}'
  WHERE ID = {{Table1.selectedRow.ID}};
SELECT * FROM perf_comments where comment_post_id = {{Table1.selectedRow.id}} ORDER BY comment_id LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM perf_comments where comment_post_ID = {{Table1.selectedRow.ID}} ORDER BY comment_ID LIMIT 10;

DELETE FROM perf_users
  WHERE ID = {{Table1.triggeredRow.ID}};

DELETE FROM perf_users
  WHERE ID = {{Table1.triggeredRow.ID}};

UPDATE perf_comments SET
		comment_author_email = '{{update_col_2.text}}',
    comment_post_ID = '{{update_col_3.text}}',
    comment_author = '{{update_col_4.text}}',
    comment_author_url = '{{update_col_5.text}}'
  WHERE comment_ID = {{Table1.selectedRow.comment_ID}};

UPDATE perf_comments SET
		comment_author_email = '{{update_col_2.text}}',
    comment_post_ID = '{{update_col_3.text}}',
    comment_author = '{{update_col_4.text}}',
    comment_author_url = '{{update_col_5.text}}'
  WHERE comment_ID = {{Table1.selectedRow.comment_ID}};

DELETE FROM perf_comments
  WHERE comment_ID = {{Table1.triggeredRow.comment_ID}};

DELETE FROM perf_comments
  WHERE comment_ID = {{Table1.triggeredRow.comment_ID}};

INSERT INTO perf_options (
	option_name, 
	option_value,
	autoload)
VALUES (
				{{insert_col_input2.text}}, 
				{{insert_col_input3.text}}, 
				{{insert_col_input4.text}});

VALUES (

DELETE FROM perf_options
  WHERE option_id = {{Table1.triggeredRow.option_id}};

DELETE FROM perf_options
  WHERE option_id = {{Table1.triggeredRow.option_id}};

UPDATE perf_options SET
		option_name = '{{update_col_2.text}}',
    option_value = '{{update_col_3.text}}',
    autoload = '{{update_col_4.text}}'
WHERE option_id = {{Table1.selectedRow.option_id}};

WHERE option_id = {{Table1.selectedRow.option_id}};

VALUES (
				{{insert_col_input2.text}}, 
				{{insert_col_input3.text}},
